data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Alagoas that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alagoas, Brazil
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, move the 778,327 believers in the state of Alagoas to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Alagoas, Brazil.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 778,327 believers living in the state of Alagoas. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Xukuru-Kariri people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Alagoas
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Alagoas, Brazil.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Alagoas, Brazil to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,342,573 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

location.name: Alagoas
location.cities_list: Maceió, Arapiraca, Rio Largo, Marechal Deodoro, União dos Palmares
location.cities_list_w_pop: Maceió (954,991), Arapiraca (166,562), Rio Largo (63,387), Marechal Deodoro (50,571), União dos Palmares (41,178)
